title: WTB- Buchner Gold Coin type card
author: darkhorse9

posts.post_title: WTB- Buchner Gold Coin type card
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to add a Buchner Gold Coin to my 19th Century type collection. Condition just needs to be presentable and no paper loss.

Let me know.
I have one but it is missing paper on the back from being torn off after glued down with the front still intact. I seen no paper loss but if you’re still possibly interested just pm me.

I have a few doubles. If you’re still looking when they get back from SGC I’ll reach out 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
